getCubicC3RotationAngles

public static final void getCubicC3RotationAngles(double[] inputAngles,
                                                  double[][] outputAngles)
Compute the two additional symmetrical points in the ODF space for the cubic crystal groups using the formula from paragraph 5.2 of Siegfried Matthies book: Standard Distribution in Texture Analysis, vol 1.

Parameters:
inputAngles - Euler angles of the original point, in radiants, alpha, beta, gamma
outputAngles - Euler angles (radiants) of the calculated additional points, first index refers to the point, second to the angle

getC3RotationAngles

public static final void getC3RotationAngles(double[] inputAngles,
                                             double[][] outputAngles)
Compute the two additional symmetrical points in the ODF space for the cubic crystal groups using the formula from paragraph 5.2 of Siegfried Matthies book: Standard Distribution in Texture Analysis, vol 1.

Parameters:
inputAngles - Euler angles of the original point, in radiants, alpha, beta, gamma
outputAngles - Euler angles (radiants) of the calculated additional points, first index refers to the point, second to the angle
